translations.chinese: 使韓太尉韓信擊韓，韓王鄭昌降。
translations.english: He sent Han marshal Han Xin to attack Han. King Han Zheng Chang surrendered.

translations.chinese: 十一月，立韓太尉信為韓王。
translations.english: In the eleventh month, he established Han marshal Xin as King of Han.

translations.chinese: 漢王還歸，都櫟陽，使諸將略地，拔隴西。
translations.english: King Han returned and established his capital at Queyang, sending various generals to seize territory and capture Longxi.

translations.chinese: 以萬人若一郡降者，封萬戶。
translations.english: Those who surrendered with ten thousand men or an entire commandery were enfeoffed with ten thousand households.
He repaired the fortifications along the Yellow River.
